articles.description: Election results from key states, including Nevada, Wisconsin and Michigan, shifted from favoring President Trump last night to Joe Biden. CNN's Phil Mattingly explains why.

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Erika Jayne of 'The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' splits with husband
articles.description: Singer and "The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills" cast member Erika Jayne has announced that her 21-year marriage to Tom Girardi has come to an end.

articles.author: Opinion by Elie Honig
articles.title: Can Trump decide when to stop counting votes?
articles.description: Elie Honig writes that Trump's declaration that he wanted "all voting to stop" that he would be "going to the Supreme Court" oversimplifies and misconceives how elections work and how the courts function.

articles.title: Rescuers fight to reach 5-year-old boy trapped in 200-foot well in India
articles.description: Officials in India's central Madhya Pradesh state are working to rescue a five-year-old boy who fell into a 200-foot well.
